name: Winter Leaves Nunofelt Wrap
description:
This is a rich and shimmery silk nunofelted with fibers in all shades of green as well as a natural white. Each leaf is cut in felt before gently and carefully being nunofelted with the silk. This wrap is totally unique and very versatile - perfect as a wrap with a black dress or your favorite denim as a scarf. Nunofelted iridescent silk wrap made with merino wool roving. Not bulky but will keep your shoulders warm!

This wrap measures approximately 16 x 72".

name: Orange and Green Nuno Felt Silk Scarf
description:
A resplendent iridescent green silk blended with hand dyed silk hankies for softness and merino wool fibers. This scarf is so versatile as the incredible colors pair beautifully with many outfits. This scarf is perfect for adding pizzazz to your wardrobe year round! Lightweight and great for wearing both inside and out.

Nunofelted silk scarf made with merino wool roving and silk.

I use merino wool and a variety of silks in my scarves.

Each of my pieces are incredibly well felted and are very durable. They are not stiff at all - I work very hard to ensure each piece has a lovely drape. They are meant to be worn often and will hold up over time. I steam mine to "freshen" them up.

Please contact me if you have any questions!

name: Yellow Gold Nuno Felt Silk Scarf
description:
Yellow Gold Nuno Felted Scarf - Nuno Felted Clothing by Indigo Crane

A dynamic hand dyed silk with hand dyed merino wool and silk fibers. The silk goes from the palest of yellows to a deep, rich gold. The fibers because they are blended with silk fibers are incredibly soft and luxurious. 

This scarf is sleek and stylish with its warm colors and it pairs beautifully with so many outfits.This is a one of a kind piece rady to ship! Lightweight and great for wearing both inside and out.

Nunofelted silk scarf made with merino wool roving and silk.

This scarf measures approximately 6 x 74". This scarf is made to order and will ship in TEN days.

I use merino wool and a variety of silks in my scarves.

Each of my pieces are incredibly well felted and are very durable. They are not stiff at all - I work very hard to ensure each piece has a lovely drape. They are meant to be worn often and will hold up over time. I steam mine to "freshen" them up.

Please contact me if you have any questions!

name: Oceans Nuno Felt Silk Poncho
description:
This poncho is One Of A Kind and ready to ship!

A dynamic, reversible Nunofelt poncho made with hand dyed silk and blended with merino wool and bamboo fibers. It is reversible and creates two very different looks. One side shows paler blues, one side deep rich blues and purples, the reverse side is the silk side which is more subtle in tone. This poncho is a midweight and while one size fits most, it runs larger than my other ponchos. I am five feet with tiny shoulders and I would say it is too big for me (otherwise I would be wearing it as these are my favorite colors!).

It adds style without bulk. No need to worry about styling, just throw it on and effortlessly add style and elegance to any outfit!

The ponchos are one size fits all.

It is made using the nunofelting process. Wool fibers and pieces of silk are laid on both sides of 8 feet of silk and merged together using water, soap, & agitation. The wool shrinks the entire piece over 50% percent, creating lovely rippling and texture.

Please contact me if you have questions!

name: Strands Nunofelt Silk Scarf
description:
Bold, stunning and rich in color and pattern, this is the scarf to make a statement with. Add it to your denim outfit or dressiest work attire and it will instantly add that pizzazz you are looking for. Nunofelted  silk scarf made with merino wool roving. The silk has a black on black floral pattern that adds subtle dimension to this scarf. Merino fibers which are light and deep blue have been nunofelted into the silk.

This scarf measures approximately 6 x 70". 

I use merino wool and a variety of silks in my scarves.

Each of my pieces are incredibly well felted and are very durable. They are not stiff at all - I work very hard to ensure each piece has a lovely drape. They are meant to be worn often and will hold up over time. I steam mine to "freshen" them up.

Please contact me if you have any questions!

name: Heliotrope Nuno Felted Silk Vest
description:
Heliotrope Nuno Felted Silk Vest by Indigo Crane Nuno Felt Clothing

A stunning, radiant Nunofelt vest made with pieces of silk chiffons, hand dyed habotai silks, and printed silk chiffons and printed silk crepe georgettes as well as merino wool, bamboo, and silk fibers. 

It is reversible and creates two very different looks. One side is an intense purple with subtle tones of blue and black merino wool showing as well as little hints of color in yellow, teal and purple. The other side is a bold field of color in dark teals, blues, peaches, blacks and purples. 

It is ultra lightweight and adds style without bulk or too much warmth. You can let it hang loose or add a pin for a more formal affair. 

This piece is a size 10 to 16 US. It is about 59" from left to right in the center and about 32" long in the center back (note the collar folds). It is 16" across the back from arm hole to arm hole

It is made using the nunofelting process. Wool fibers and pieces of silk are laid on both sides of 9 feet of silk and merged together using water, soap, & agitation. The wool shrinks the entire piece about 50% percent, creating lovely rippling and texture. 

This vest is One Of A Kind and ready to ship!

Please contact me if you have questions!

name: Steel Blue Nunofelt Silk Wrap
description:
A sumptuous iridescent steel blue gray silk wrap with various shades of blue and brown merino wool and bamboo fibers.  The perfect wrap for every night out! Add it to a black dress for dinner and a night out or pair it with something casual to add simple elegance!

Nunofelted silk wrap made with merino wool roving and silk. Ready to ship!

name: Anemone Nuno Felt Silk Scarf
description:
A vibrant hand dyed silk paj is paired with blue, orange, purple and turquoise merino wool fibers to create a dynamic, sumptuous scarf perfect for adding the "wow" to any outfit. This nuno felted scarf is made from merino wool fiber and silk fabric. The crosses are blended of different colors with the circular centers revealing multiple colors on the edges and different colors in each center. One a kind and ready to ship! Lightweight and great for wearing both inside and out.


Each of my pieces are incredibly well felted and are very durable. They are not stiff at all - I work very hard to ensure each piece has a lovely drape. They are meant to be worn often and will hold up over time. I steam mine to "freshen" them up.

name: Burgundy Nuno Felt Silk Wrap
description:
A sumptuous hand dyed burgundy silk with wine, orange, lavender and pink merino wool fibers. This thin wrap is sublte and bold and makes for a truly one of a kind piece. You can drape it over your shoulders for a light wrap and do a simple tie in front for a wider scarf. Add it to a black dress for dinner and a night out or pair it with something casual to add simple elegance!

Nunofelted silk wrap made with merino wool roving and silk. Ready to ship!
